a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Share of 15 year olds in the highest mathematics score level, girls vs. boys, 2018
Assessed through the PISA mathematics scale, which is based on an OECD country mean of 500 points and a
standard deviation of 100 points. The highest level of achievement is reaching a score surpassing 669 on the PISA
Share of girls in the highest mathematics score level
Share of boys in the highest mathematics score level
Data source: OECD via World Bank (2023)
